languages.text: В протекторате воцарилась междоусобица за право преемства, и кровь, пролитая в ней, превзошла даже ту, что была на руках Каллигоса.
The protectorate became engulfed in a brutal fight for the throne that made Calligos's violent deeds seem tame in comparison.
languages.original_text: В протекторате воцарилась междоусобица за право преемства, и кровь, пролитая в ней, превзошла даже ту, что была на руках Каллигоса.

traits.locale_text: The most apparent heir to Calligos, Evayne Winterscale, lost his life at the hand of an assassin sent by his competitor mere hours before Magnae Accessio. The protectorate got consumed by the fight for the right of succession. This fight has seen more blood than even Calligos has ever spilt.

The most apparent heir to Calligos, Evayne Winterscale, lost his life at the hand of an assassin sent by his competitor mere hours before Magnae Accessio. The protectorate got consumed by the fight for the right of succession. This fight has seen more blood than even Calligos has ever spilt.

The most apparent heir to Calligos, Evayne Winterscale, lost his life at the hands of an assassin sent by his rival mere hours before the Magnae Accessio. The protectorate became engulfed in a fight for the throne more costly than all the blood on Calligos's hands.

The most apparent heir to Calligos, Evayne Winterscale, lost his life at the hands of an assassin sent by his rival mere hours before the Magnae Accessio. The protectorate became engulfed in a fight for the throne more costly than all the blood on Calligos's hands.
The protectorate became engulfed in a brutal fight for the throne that made Calligos's violent deeds seem tame in comparison.
The protectorate became engulfed in a brutal fight for the throne that made Calligos's violent deeds seem tame in comparison.

languages.text: 温特斯凯尔王朝陷入了争夺王位的战乱之中，王朝承受了惨重伤亡，甚至让卡里戈斯的大屠杀相形见绌。
languages.original_text: The protectorate became engulfed in a brutal fight for the throne that made Calligos's violent deeds seem tame in comparison.

traits.locale_text: 温特斯凯尔王朝陷入了争夺王位的战乱之中，王朝承受了惨重伤亡，甚至比卡里戈斯手上沾的鲜血还要多。

languages.text: Das Protektorat wurde in einen brutalen Kampf um den Thron verwickelt, gegen den Calligos' brutale Taten fast harmlos wirkten.
languages.original_text: The protectorate became engulfed in a brutal fight for the throne that made Calligos's violent deeds seem tame in comparison.

traits.locale_text: Evayne Winterzunder, Calligos' offensichtlichster Erbe, starb wenige Stunden vor der Magnae Accessio durch die Hände eines Attentäters, den sein Rivale geschickt hatte. Das Protektorat wurde in einen brutalen Kampf um den Thron verwickelt, gegen den das Blut an Calligos' Händen fast verblasste.

languages.text: Le protectorat s'embourba dans une lutte pour le trône qui fit couler bien plus de sang que Calligos le barbare n'en avait sur les mains.
languages.original_text: The protectorate became engulfed in a brutal fight for the throne that made Calligos's violent deeds seem tame in comparison.

traits.locale_text: Le protectorat s'embourba dans une lutte pour le trône qui fit couler bien plus de sang que Calligos n’en avait sur les mains.

languages.text: El protectorado quedó consumido en una lucha tan brutal por el trono que hizo palidecer a los actos sanguinarios de Calligos.
languages.original_text: The protectorate became engulfed in a brutal fight for the throne that made Calligos's violent deeds seem tame in comparison.

traits.locale_text: El protectorado quedó consumido en una lucha por el trono que derramó más sangre que las manos de Calligos.

languages.text: 保護領は、カリゴスの乱暴狼藉と比べてもより残酷な王座継承争いに巻き込まれた。
languages.original_text: The protectorate became engulfed in a brutal fight for the throne that made Calligos's violent deeds seem tame in comparison.

traits.locale_text: 保護領は、カリゴスの乱暴狼藉と比べてもより残酷な王座継承争いに巻き込まれた。

languages.text: Protektora, taht uğruna verilen vahşi bir savaşla kasıp kavruldu. Bu öyle bir savaştı ki Calligos'un gaddarca eylemleri, yanında yavan kalıyordu.
languages.original_text: The protectorate became engulfed in a brutal fight for the throne that made Calligos's violent deeds seem tame in comparison.

traits.locale_text: Protektora, taht uğruna verilen vahşi bir savaşla kasıp kavruldu. Öyle bir savaş oldu ki Calligos'un gaddarca eylemleri, bu savaşa kıyasla yavan kalıyordu.
